data.actual_result: The bar changes size and everything below it moves a bit up.
data.expected_result: Like all other elements on screen, the bar does not change size.
data.short_description: When you switch orientation from portrait to landscape when you're in the DM list, the "Find or start a conversation" bar that leads to the quick switcher changes size.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the DM list. - Switch orientation. - Observe the black bar or whatever that leads you to the QS.
